name.baseName: Northwest (Fuping) Wheat-Corn Production | Raw Material Extraction and Transportation
西北（富平）小麦-玉米生产 | 原材料开采与运输

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: The lifecycle evaluation of agricultural products starts from mining of ores and energy, terminated by the output of crops, including the output of agricultural products and pollutants. Land resources are the basis of all production activities and directly enter the agricultural production system."
农产品生命周期评价从矿石和能源开采开始，终止于农作物种植输出，包括农产品和污染物的输出两部分，土地资源是一切生产活动的基础，直接进入农作系统。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The data for the study mainly comes from field surveys conducted from August to September 2013, randomly surveying 30 farmers each in Fuping and Yangling, regarding the planting of winter wheat and summer corn.
研究的数据主要来自2013 年8—9 月的实地调研，分别随机调查富平、杨凌两地各30 户种植户的冬小麦-夏玉米种植情况，
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: Impact assessment consists of four steps: impact categorization, characterization, normalization, and weighted assessment.
影响评价由影响分类、特征化、标准化、加权评估4 个步骤组成。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 彭小瑜, 吴喜慧, 吴发启, 等. 陕西关中地区冬小麦-夏玉米轮作系统生命周期评价[J]. Journal of Agro-Environment Science, 2015, 34(4).
彭小瑜, 吴喜慧, 吴发启, 等. 陕西关中地区冬小麦-夏玉米轮作系统生命周期评价[J]. Journal of Agro-Environment Science, 2015, 34(4).

completeness.common:other: 冬小麦-夏玉米轮作系统生命周期主要包括原材料开采与运输、农资的生产与运输以及农作物种植三个阶段，包括煤、石油、天然气、电力等原材料的开采和生产，土地资源的利用，化肥、农药等农资生产相关的能耗和污染物排放，包括CO2、NH3、SO2、CH4、N2O 和CO等。与该系统相关的厂房设备、建筑设施、运输工具的生产和原材料的运输等环节对环境的影响则不予考虑。

The lifecycle of the winter wheat-summer maize rotation system primarily includes three stages: the extraction and transportation of raw materials, the production and transportation of agricultural inputs, and the cultivation of crops. This encompasses the mining and production of raw materials such as coal, oil, natural gas, and electricity; the utilization of land resources; and the energy consumption and pollutant emissions related to the production of agricultural inputs like fertilizers and pesticides, including CO2, NH3, SO2, CH4, N2O, and CO. The environmental impacts of the production of facilities and equipment related to the system, building infrastructures, and the transportation of raw materials are not considered in this context.

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。
